mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary(diaryno, title, ddate, summary, weather_code, emno, memberno, illustno) VALUES(diary_seq.nextval, #{title}, sysdate, #{summary}, #{weather_code}, #{emno}, #{memberno}, #{illustno})
mapper.select: SELECT diaryno, title, ddate, summary, weather_code, emno, illustno FROM diary ORDER BY diaryno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary WHERE diaryno = #{diaryno}

SELECT diaryno, title, ddate, summary, weather_code, emno, illustno FROM diary WHERE (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR LOWER(title) LIKE LOWER(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) AND (#{startDate,jdbcType=DATE} IS NULL OR ddate >= TO_DATE(#{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} IS NULL OR ddate <= TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY ddate DESC
